documentation.text: @dev Boolean indicating if `msg.sender` is to be used as the root oracle instead of using current Uniswap market conditions.

@notice Constructor for the Uniswap LP token price oracle.
 @param _useRootOracle Boolean indicating if `msg.sender` is to be used as the root oracle instead of using current Uniswap market conditions (be warned of security risks when not using a trusted root oracle).

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Uniswap LP token was updated in this block. Reverting due to risk of price manipulation."

arguments.value: Uniswap LP token was updated in this block. Reverting due to risk of price manipulation.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Uniswap LP token was updated in this block. Reverting due to risk of price manipulation."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Uniswap LP token not based in ETH and root oracle not available."

arguments.value: Uniswap LP token not based in ETH and root oracle not available.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Uniswap LP token not based in ETH and root oracle not available."

documentation.text: @dev Fetches the fair LP token token/ETH price from Uniswap, with 18 decimals of precision.

attributes.text: @dev Boolean indicating if `msg.sender` is to be used as the root oracle instead of using current Uniswap market conditions.

@notice Constructor for the Uniswap LP token price oracle.
 @param _useRootOracle Boolean indicating if `msg.sender` is to be used as the root oracle instead of using current Uniswap market conditions (be warned of security risks when not using a trusted root oracle).
@dev Fetches the fair LP token token/ETH price from Uniswap, with 18 decimals of precision.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Uniswap LP token was updated in this block. Reverting due to risk of price manipulation."

attributes.value: Uniswap LP token was updated in this block. Reverting due to risk of price manipulation.

devdoc.author: David Lucid <david@rari.capital> (https://github.com/davidlucid)
devdoc.details: Implements the `PriceOracle` interface used by Fuse pools (and Compound v2).

params._useRootOracle: Boolean indicating if `msg.sender` is to be used as the root oracle instead of using current Uniswap market conditions (be warned of security risks when not using a trusted root oracle).

getUnderlyingPrice(address).details: Implements the PriceOracle interface for Fuse pools (and Compound v2).

params.cToken: The cToken address for price retrieval

returns._0: Price denominated in ETH, with 18 decimals, for the given cToken address

params.underlying: The underlying token address for which to get the price (set to zero address for ETH)

useRootOracle.details: Boolean indicating if `msg.sender` is to be used as the root oracle instead of using current Uniswap market conditions.

devdoc.title: UniswapLpTokenPriceOracle

methods.constructor: Constructor for the Uniswap LP token price oracle.

getUnderlyingPrice(address).notice: Get the underlying price of a cToken

price(address).notice: Get the LP token price price for an underlying token address

userdoc.notice: UniswapLpTokenPriceOracle is a price oracle for Uniswap (and SushiSwap) LP tokens.
